metadata.title: RA Family: What is the difference between Voice Kit and this AI Kit?

sections.content:
Question:
What is the difference between Voice Kit and this AI Kit?
Answer:
Renesas is focusing on three AI/ML technology pillars: Realtime Analytics(sensing), Voice, and Vision. Both kits are released to cover those pillars.
Voice Kit: Voice
AI Kit: Realtime Analytics and Vision
Suitable Products
AIK-RA6M3
AIK-RA4E1
